So CSGO is a hard game to tell someone to recommend because it takes a MASSIVE amount of skill to play, its probably one of, if not the most skill based FPS game out there. I would say its a 8/10 for me because there isnt anything extremely overpowered and everything is VERY balanced, and even when something released isnt (R8 revolver) its patched rather quickly. Its now a balanced gun and can compete against the Deagle for those who have very good aim. Yes there are hackers/smurfs EVERYWHERE, but like... what game doesnt :P
